tuv.seg: You are leaving the graphical boot menu and starting the text mode interface.
Iwe wakusiya girafikau menyu yekugadza nekutanga mashandiro anemavara emeso.
This is boot disk %u. Insert boot disk %u.
ino i disiki yeku gadza %u. Isa disiki yekugadza %u.
This is not a suitable boot disk. Please insert boot disk %u.
ino idisiki yekugadza isina kufanira. Isa disiki yekugadza %u.
This is a two-sided DVD. You have booted from the second side. Turn the DVD over then continue.
ino i DVD inemativi maviri. Iwe wagadza kubva kudivi rechipiri. Tendeudza DVD wobva waenderera.
Vakirira pfimbi ye mufananidzo isina dhisiki
Display information on this GNOME version
GNOME is a Free, usable, stable, accessible desktop environment for the Unix-like family of operating systems.
GNOME yavakwa nenyanzvi dzinozvigona uye inovanikwa pachena.
GNOME includes most of what you see on your computer, including the file manager, web browser, menus, and many applications.
GNOME ndiyo inezvese zvioonekwa nemaziso paDesktop kusanganisira browser.
GNOME also includes a complete development platform for applications programmers, allowing the creation of powerful and complex applications.
GNOME zvekushandisa pakugadzira manwe mapurogiramu zvakakwana.
GNOME's focus on usability and accessibility, regular release cycle, and strong corporate backing make it unique among Free Software desktops.
GNOME yakagadzirwa kuti ishandisike zviri nyore ichibatsirwa nevemabhizimisi zvinoitsaura paruzhinji.
GNOME's greatest strength is our strong community. Virtually anyone, with or without coding skills, can contribute to making GNOME better.
GNOME inosimbiswa neruzhinji nokuti ani naani zvake anogona kubatsira pakugadzirwa kwayo.

Hundreds of people have contributed code to GNOME since it was started in 1997; many more have contributed in other important ways, including translations, documentation, and quality assurance.UnknownMonitor vendor
Chaunga chabatsira mukugadzirwa kweGNOME kubvira payakatanga 1997; kubudikidza nekuturikira kuenda kune mimwe mitauro uye kuona nezvekushandisika kwayo nyore.UnknownMonitor vendor
